name: The First Piece of Art
description:
The world-famous recently founded game studio iT-juMalat presents:

Have you ever thought about anything? Well, now is time to do some serious thinking. This game is awesome. It contains everything a true piece of art should contain: paintings, puzzles and birds. Made with love and unity.

Part of XAMK game jam 2021 II, theme ART

Credits:

Fighting börbs minigame: Tatu

Idea: Milja and Tatu

Level Design: Milja

Programming: Milja

Programming assistant and personal teacher: Tatu

Art: Milja and Tatu

Most crying done by Milja

Made everything twice thanks to Tatu's stupid fighting börbs minigame: Milja

Special thanks: Unity and it's package manager.

Music: 

Mozart Piano Concerto no. 21 in C major, K. 467 - II. Andante by Markus Staab https://musopen.org/music/2635-piano-concerto-no-21-in-c-major-k-467/ Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

The painting that most definitely doesn't have anything to do with our game propably: Taistelevat metsot, Ferninand Von Wright, 1886
